__e: Why don't you go wait at the counter and mind your own goddamn business?
I know where it was, so it had to be a year and a half, where I was sitting on a counter, and my aunt, who...
I go to a counter and tell them I've lost mine and may I please have another one.
I think it was my second week in the job and I was doing a shift on the duty desk.
The best thing you can do for yourself is go to the desk over there and tell the nurse all the information about the patient, all right.
